title: DOM XSS via iframe srcdoc
description: This case demonstrates a DOM-based XSS vulnerability where user input is injected into an iframe's srcdoc attribute without sanitization.
objectives: Enter input into the text field.
Observe how the input is injected into the iframe srcdoc attribute.
Craft a payload that triggers XSS.
hints: Type some HTML tags into the input field.
Consider how iframe srcdoc renders user input directly.
